Package org.planit.trafficassignment

Class TraditionalStaticAssignment

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.djutils.event.EventProducer
      • org.planit.trafficassignment.TrafficAssignmentComponent<NetworkLoading>
        • org.planit.supply.networkloading.NetworkLoading
          • org.planit.trafficassignment.TrafficAssignment
            • org.planit.trafficassignment.TraditionalStaticAssignment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, EventListener, org.djutils.event.EventListenerInterface, org.djutils.event.EventProducerInterface, InteractorAccessee, LinkVolumeAccessee
    public class TraditionalStaticAssignment
extends TrafficAssignment
implements LinkVolumeAccessee
    Traditional static assignment traffic component. Provides configuration access via the CapacityRestrainedTrafficAssignmentBuilder it instantiates
    Author:
    markr, gman6028
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

                           throws org.planit.exceptions.PlanItException
        Initialize running simulation variables for the time period
        Parameters:

        Throws:
        org.planit.exceptions.PlanItException - thrown if there is an error

      • applySmoothing

        private void applySmoothing​(ModeData modeData)
        Apply smoothing based on current and previous flows and the adopted smoothing method. The smoothed results are registered as the current segment flows while the current segment flows are assigned to the previous segment flows (which are discarded).
        Parameters:
        modeData - data for the current mode

      • executeModeTimePeriod

        private void executeModeTimePeriod​(org.planit.utils.network.physical.Mode mode,
                                   ODDemandMatrix odDemandMatrix,
                                   ModeData currentModeData,
                                   double[] modalNetworkSegmentCosts,
                                   ShortestPathAlgorithm shortestPathAlgorithm)
                            throws org.planit.exceptions.PlanItException
        Perform assignment for a given time period, mode and costs imposed on Dijkstra shortest path
        Parameters:
        mode - the current mode
        odDemandMatrix - origin-demand matrix
        currentModeData - data for the current mode
        modalNetworkSegmentCosts - segment costs for the network
        shortestPathAlgorithm - shortest path algorithm to be used
        Throws:
        org.planit.exceptions.PlanItException - thrown if there is an error

      • getShortestPathCost

        private double getShortestPathCost​(org.planit.utils.misc.Pair<Double,​org.planit.utils.graph.EdgeSegment>[] vertexPathAndCost,

                                   org.planit.utils.network.virtual.Zone currentDestinationZone,
                                   double[] modalNetworkSegmentCosts,
                                   double odDemand,
                                   ModeData currentModeData)
                            throws org.planit.exceptions.PlanItException
        Calculate the route cost for the calculated minimum cost path from a specified origin to a specified destination
        Parameters:
        vertexPathAndCost - array of Pairs containing the current vertex path and cost
        currentOriginZone - current origin zone
        currentDestinationZone - current destination zone
        modalNetworkSegmentCosts - segment costs for the network
        odDemand - the demands from the specified origin to the specified destination
        currentModeData - data for the current mode
        Returns:
        the route cost for the calculated minimum cost path
        Throws:
        org.planit.exceptions.PlanItException - thrown if there is an error

      • initializeModalLinkSegmentCosts

        private double[] initializeModalLinkSegmentCosts​(org.planit.utils.network.physical.Mode mode,
                                                 TimePeriod timePeriod)
                                          throws org.planit.exceptions.PlanItException
        Initialize the modal link segment costs before the first iteration. This method uses initial link segment costs if they have been input, otherwise these are calculated from zero start values
        Parameters:
        mode - current mode
        timePeriod - current time period
        Returns:
        array containing link costs for each link segment
        Throws:
        org.planit.exceptions.PlanItException - thrown if there is an error

      • notify

        public void notify​(org.djutils.event.EventInterface event)
            throws RemoteException
        Deal with requests for link volume accessees since we are one. Whenever such a request arrives, we provide ourselves as a candidate and fire a response event of type LinkVolumeAccessee.INTERACTOR_PROVIDE_LINKVOLUMEACCESSEE
        Specified by:
        notify in interface org.djutils.event.EventListenerInterface
        Parameters:
        event - to process
        Throws:
        RemoteException
